context_bundle.summary: Rust compiler error guide - common error codes (E0382, E0499, E0106, etc.) with explanations and solutions.

onboarding.quick_start: rustc --explain E0382 for detailed help. Common: E0382 (moved value), E0499 (multiple &mut), E0106 (missing lifetime), E0277 (trait bound).
common_patterns: E0382: Clone or use references instead of move
E0106: Add lifetime annotation fn foo<'a>(x: &'a str)
E0277: Add trait bound fn foo<T: Display>(x: T)
